All I'm saying is ask the girl what she wants to be called. It's up to her and her parents. A government run school should have absolutely nothing to do with that decision. We are capitalist, not fascist. So again, I don't give a flying fuck about you or how you pay your bills or who you know. The teacher was out of line. She should have just kept her head down and done her job. Then there wouldn't be this mess and she would still have her job.

Buildings have absolutely no significance . Yes they can be making a statement about demolition of churches but the lashjback will be as great which simply aggravates a situation to more conflict, If this is the way the so called religion of peace acts out its charter, then their agenda is more sinister and should not be taken so lightly. The problem is that western culture tolerates religious freedom whereas they do not.. What is good for the goose is good for the gander and any form of extremism in any country must never be condoned. Those who support these extremist views in your country which if Christian dominant must do the same as what the grand moffie advocates to their places of worship and to send them back to countries that do not tolerate or accept other religions. The problem is..they not wanted there either. The Western world must start waking up to these facts and leaders like Obama have misleading theia once great nation to disaster.
